xml.brief: Retrieve information on multiple geopath log entries

desc.p: This method works like the services/OCPL/paths/gplog_entry method, but works with multiple log entries (instead of only one).

req.name: gplog_uuids
req.p: Pipe-separated list of UUIDs. These represent the log entries you are interested in. No more than 500 codes are allowed. Unlike in the "entry" method, this CAN be an empty string (it will result in an empty, but valid, response).

opt.name: fields
opt.p: Same as in the services/OCPL/paths/gplog_entry method. Pipe-separated list of field names which you are interested with. See services/OCPL/paths/gplog_entry method for a list of available values.

returns.p: A dictionary. UUIDs you provide will be mapped to dictionary keys, and each value will be a dictionary of fields you have selected.
Value of null means that the given UUID haven't been found. (This behavior is different than in the services/OCPL/paths/gplog_entry method, which responds with an HTTP 400 error in such case.)
